bio:
I am a multidisciplinary designer hailing from the sunny island of Singapore. Growing up, the magic of media was impressed upon me by creators worldwide. I want to create the same effect on people with my work and hopefully inspire the next generation of creatives.
I love anything and everything design, so I often research and use different mediums in my works. I like to compile all the skills I learnt into a web-based experience, creating unique, interesting and polished websites with a variety of content and technologies.

key_projects.title: Imaginarium
key_projects.project_description: Imaginarium is a collaborative, immersive web-based experience that invites participants to input their ideas to a web portal, with their inputs showing up to a central page where everyone's inputs are gathered for all to see. Imaginarium was a group project and my contribution was the idea and coding. The Project was created using HTML, CSS and Javascript, with Three.js.

key_projects.title: Fortress X AMAA Artist Alley Motion
key_projects.project_description: Fortress X AMAA Artist Alley is a motion graphic work showcasing the artists that are tabling at the Fortress X AMAA Artist alley held at Fortress. I was contacted to create a moving graphic for the main screen in the Fortress Esports areana. The project was created using Adobe Illustrator and After Effects.

key_projects.title: Pasar Malam
key_projects.project_description: Pasar Malam is a 3D diorama that relives a nostalgic memory of me as a child, playing games at a Pasar Malam (Night Market) stall back in Singapore. The model features custom painted textures, animations, and cloth physics. The project was created in Autodesk Maya and uploaded to Sketchfab.
